title: What are some facts about iKON? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly IKON is a South Korean boy band formed in 2015 by YG Entertainment. The group was first introduced in the reality survival program WIN: Who is Next as "Team B". The group consists of 7 members. B.l, Jay, Song, Bobby, DK, Chan & Ju-ne .  Now some Random facts about IKON Chan has played a younger Lee Min-ho in dramas Boys Over Flowers and The Heirs. Ju-ne went on Star King as a child and slayed his Michael Jackson performance. He can still imitate the legend to this day. iKON members say Jay is extremely flirtatious with the fans and even the staff (maybe he’s just really polite haha). B.I composed and produced all songs in their first album Their song "Love Scenario" is the hit of 2018 The song became so popular in South Korea it was used in everything from tv advertisements to K-dramas. It even became a favourite with schoolchildren, which with schools banning the song because kids would not stop singing it. iKON's impact. ( I really love this song ) Hanbin, Jinhwan and Bobby are the first members of Team B who then became IKON Out of all members Jinhwan cries the most B.I has composed over 80 songs Jay is multilingual

iKON are one of the biggest groups of the year already! Let’s get to know the members with 14 fun facts: 1. Chan has played a younger Lee Min-ho in dramas Boys Over Flowers and The Heirs. 2. Ju-ne went on Star King as a child and slayed his Michael Jackson performance. He can still imitate the legend to this day. 3. Yunhyeong likes to make fun of other members in the group but hates it when people make fun of him. 6. YG claims that Jay is the next Taeyang (dope comparison, congratz). 7. Bobby is known to sleep talk and never skip breakfast in the morning (he probably talks about whats he’s gonna eat in his sleep). 12. Yunhyeong’s family own a BBQ restaurant, which is probably why he’s good at cooking (he’s nicknamed Song Chef by the members). 13. iKON members say Jay is extremely flirtatious with the fans and even the staff (maybe he’s just really polite haha). 14. When B.I. was asked who he would like to have as a son from the members he said no one. Although if he had to choose he’d pick Yunhyeong because of his kindness.
